page.title: 03SUNNINGDALE GOLF COURSE
page.content: Sunningdale Golf Course is renowned worldwide for its fine grass,heathland and beautiful surroundings.It was built in 1901,at the beginning of the reign of Edward VII,and was opened the following year. The Golf Club's members come from all corners of the globe,notably from France and Spain and only 20% live locally.Bruce Forsyth and JimmyTarbuck -famous personalities are members. Naturally,houses in the region are expensive for keen golfers are willing to pay handsomely for the convenience of living near a world-famous course. Every year the Eoropean Golf Champs. is held at Sunningdale and stars like Severiano Ballesteros gather there to play.The Golf Course's link with the local community is that it provides a valuable recreational amenity.
